Articles.Content:
The circumference and gravity values shown in the tracking station (under Physical Characteristics) appears to be incorrect.  

Should be 9.8 m/s for gravity and 3.6 Million meters for circumference.

Multiple entries in the Physical Characteristics / Orbital Characteristics are wrong - not just gravity and circumference. 

Siderial Period should probably be in seconds, not m/s.

atmosphere should probably be 1 atm, or a pressure value.

Would be good to see the LAN and Argument of Perigee also for the orbit. Along with all the same orbit details for any vessels
